statements: SELECT * FROM DataRetentionPolicy;
SELECT policy_name, retention_duration FROM DataRetentionPolicy ORDER BY retention_duration DESC;
SELECT id, policy_name FROM DataRetentionPolicy WHERE retention_duration > 10;
SELECT * FROM DataRetentionPolicy WHERE creation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, creation_date, policy_name, retention_duration FROM DataRetentionPolicy ORDER BY creation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM DataRetentionPolicy ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, retention_duration FROM DataRetentionPolicy WHERE retention_duration > 365;
SELECT * FROM DataRetentionPolicy WHERE policy_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, policy_name FROM DataRetentionPolicy WHERE retention_duration BETWEEN 30 AND 365 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT creation_date FROM DataRetentionPolicy WHERE MONTH(creation_date) = 6;
SELECT * FROM retention_policies;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policies WHERE retention_period > 30;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM data_logs WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM data_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM retention_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policies WHERE retention_period > 30;
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM data_logs WHERE policy_id = 2 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM retention_policies INNER JOIN data_logs ON retention_policies.policy_id = data_logs.policy_id;
SELECT policy_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM data_logs GROUP BY policy_id HAVING total_logs > 5;
SELECT * FROM retention_policies ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policies WHERE enforcement_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM outdated_data WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY expires_at;
SELECT info_content FROM relevant_information WHERE relevant = TRUE;
SELECT id, policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policies WHERE enforcement_enabled = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM retention_policies WHERE id = 1 AND enforcement_enabled = TRUE
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM retention_policies ORDER BY retention_period DESC NULLS LAST
SELECT data_content FROM outdated_data WHERE expires_at < NOW() ORDER BY created_at LIMIT 10
SELECT info_content, deletion_date FROM relevant_information WHERE relevant = TRUE AND deletion_date IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM outdated_data JOIN retention_policies ON outdated_data.created_at > retention_policies.retention_period
SELECT * FROM retention_policies;
SELECT policy_name, retention_days FROM retention_policies WHERE retention_days > 30;
SELECT data_content FROM retained_data ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM data_categories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT mapping_id, data_id, category_id FROM data_mapping ORDER BY mapping_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM retention_policies
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM retention_policies
SELECT retention_days, policy_name FROM retention_policies ORDER BY retention_days DESC
SELECT * FROM retained_data WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT data_id, data_content FROM retained_data WHERE data_content LIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policy;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policy ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT data_id, data_name, creation_date FROM data_table WHERE data_name = 'example_data';
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM data_category WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT data_id, data_name, data_content FROM data_table ORDER BY creation_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM data_retention_policy ORDER BY retention_period DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT data_name, data_content FROM data_table WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT data_name, category_name FROM data_table INNER JOIN data_categorization ON data_table.data_id = data_categorization.data_id INNER JOIN data_category ON data_categorization.category_id = data_category.category_id;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, retention_period FROM data_retention_policy WHERE retention_period > INTERVAL '1 year';
SELECT data_name, expired_date FROM data_table LEFT JOIN expired_data ON data_table.data_id = expired_data.data_id WHERE expired_data.expired_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
